days.title: True name
days.specialMess: This month will be focused on my most precious topic: The Sun !! generally it will be easy cause the one reading it should know herself, right ? hhh
days.enigma: The Sun is so lovely, she is shiny, gentle, caring, gives off that warm light to anyone facing her so freely!! but we should know firstly her full name, could you guess it ?
hints: I hope you don't have Amnesia üò≠
days.reaction: YES !! Masha'Allah, nchllh she get shinier and blessed each day

days.title: Favourite color
days.enigma: The Sun is yellow, yet, it's not the color that she would really prefer the most, I wonder what's her favourite color.
hints: you love reacting with some particualr emoji
days.reaction: purple is also the theme color used for this project üíúüíúüíú

days.title: Nickname
days.enigma: Actually, I have named the Sun with many different nicknames, you can say I got addicted, hhh. I might have a favourite one.
hints: Synonym of Starlight
days.reaction: I love it !! cause it represents directly those beautiful rays emmited that keeps me warm when facing her ‚òÄÔ∏èüíô

days.title: forgotten enigma
days.enigma: I didn't FORGET about that Enigma, hehe, but I am sure you're more than capable to beat it. If you forgot where was the challenge, I kept a link here. The last word found in encrypted message is the answer.
hints: do you remember when I said back in the oldschool networking, people needed a language with just binary : 0 or 1. I am sure you are familiar with it
are all the spaces equal ? hmmm
maybe try to remember a language where we can just use two caracters
days.reaction: Yaaay !! you now are 100% up to date with my enigmas, Yuppiii.... Or is it...hhh

days.title: Chronicles of Byul I
days.enigma: Night passed out After Byul tried so tiressly to find the temple till the night came in. She lifted her head and gazes through the clear moon in the sky
hints: Byul did really love seeing the beautiness of nature
Was there a moon in the story ?
you can check maybe some specific slide in the story ?
days.reaction: The sky was indeed beautiful ‚ú®‚ú®

days.title: Glory to Shaymin
days.enigma: I love Shaymin !! it does suit so well with personality of Sunshine. Shaymin prefers to live around 'plainedGrass', if you go there, I am sure she would be so happy that it would give you a gift
hints: The place could be related to a certain path to make
you have ability to manipulate paths, try visit her !!!
days.reaction: Make sure to visit her again in another time !!!

days.title: Missing soulmate, The Moon
days.specialMess: Ok... I am so sorry, You might hate me with this enigma, so I let you use your time machine if you cannot accept the normal terms of today's Enigma
days.enigma: The shinning Sun had a key agreed upon with the moon, but They divided it so each one can guar its own half: SunAndMoonCTF{1_4m_Y0u_4nd_
hints: The only thing that could let you win this fairly, is to wait the moon's Enigma that gives you the other half
days.reaction: Soulmates had met and made the best combo, nchllh the fate would bring them closer !!

days.title: Favourite Pen
days.enigma: The Sun has a beautiful pen that I also appreciate its form and structure. In term of BDD, how can I identify that pen?
hints: Does the pen had some sort of matricule that it could identify it
days.reaction: That's the pen, I loved it !!!

days.title: ID of the Sun
days.enigma: is There some sort of Matricule that can identify the sunshine out of anyone in Esi ?
hints: I really hope you don't have amnesia üò≠üò≠üò≠
In terms of BDD, your ID is...
days.reaction: Ohhhh, look how unique this is !!

days.title: the day of birth
days.specialMess: this day is really special, if you read this, then firstly: Congratulations!!! I made sure to give the theme of this month like this only cause of this day. nchllh le39ouba to 100 years
days.enigma: Master actually left an older artifact in a tower you are already familiar with, it's related to the beginning of time where a blessed soul has just came to life. Oh, also Cinammon left you a video in the link
hints: Maybe it's related when was born that person ?
Remember how did you unlock the clock first time ? maybe there's another 'Time' that could trigger it
days.answer: Happy Birthday to my most precious person!!
days.reaction: I wonder which year you did this, but note to the future you: Congrats et Bsse7tek !!!

days.title: The spoken suggestion
days.enigma: I admit, I ran out of ideas... So I asked you if you suggest me something, and you did ! it is the solution of this quiz, hhh. Hints are understandable to use here.
hints: the day this quiz was created is the same day I got from you a suggestion
Ubishi... Does it remind you of something ?
I actually sent your suggestion in insta, so no need to ask me to send it to you for profesionalism, hhh
days.reaction: JBKQJSKJBQKJBCK , YOU REMEMBERED !!! what an autistic enigma quiz, hhh

days.title: Evil Sun
days.enigma: speaking of Sun, in Super Smash Bros Ultimate. There was a big evil as shown in the link down below, name this evil and the enigma shall be yours
hints: Google is permissible, you know, hhh
days.reaction: El7emdoulillah the Sunshine I appreciate has the opposite personality of this creature, hhh

days.title: Chronicles of Byul II
days.enigma: In the main story of Unfazed Time, there was a symbolic scene shown that represents Byul facing against time itself proving her patience and dedication in her adventure, if you spotted it, tip the time written on that moment as HH:MM
hints: Byul facing time is a metaphore and not one at the same time, but which one you should seek ?
Clock also represents time, was there a moment were both Byul and Clock existed at the same scene ?
days.reaction: As Courageous as she was, she kept going forward against Time üïò

days.title: the golden number
days.enigma: Ahh yes, Silicium, the most important material to build a cpu, do you also know what's special chimically about it?
hints: Chimical table is a good tool to inspect materials
What day is today ?
days.reaction: Yeah, who cares about its befenics, but most importantly it has 14 as atomic number!!!

days.title: Chronicles of Byul III
days.enigma: While Byul returning to enter the temple again, she realised the script in the wall has changed due to paradoxal Time anomalies
hints: you can use webshell of picoCTF to hash in md5
days.reaction: Thank you, for making my life happier each day

days.title: It's Pottery Time !!!
days.enigma: You made many potteries that definitely look beautiful. However, I do have a favourite one, could you guess which one was?
hints: it was special for me, that's why it's my favourite one
days.reaction: A favourite pokemon pottery made by my favourite person, thank you !!

days.title: Enigma Arts I
days.specialMess: Enigma arts are art general based enigmas, meaning you can find clue only with photos to trace the whereabouts of key. They are independent to month's theme, and they are fun ! it was my dream to build some treasure hunt mini-games, so I hope you can enjoy them all.
days.enigma: Hint arts usually don't have the text, you can go directly inspect a photo down the link to hunt the flag!
hints: Green color with black as theme, I wonder where did I see that...
days.reaction: Nice hunt !!! you are already Pro !!

days.title: the cursed subject
days.enigma: I see Algebra, it reminded me of it, I see Ana, it reminded me of it, I try to study BDD, nope! it's there again, I TRY POO, WHY IS IT AGAIN THERE, KJQSBJBQKJSBDQKJ... so Yeah, as I said: 'everythin is....'
hints: Spiders even hate it cause their house reminded them of it, bruh
days.reaction: Even this page is RO...

days.title: Memorable day
days.enigma: Sunshine organised an event with her team members about playing many different mini games to get tickets and to have fun, key of Todays's Enigma: $[EventName]CTF{$[LOCATION]_at_$[DD/MM/YYYY]}
hints: I remember you gave me something on that day telling me I was a VIP, thank goodness I brang also something to gift it to you, hhh
days.reaction: Those were the good days, El7emdoulillah we experienced it

days.title: Chronicles of Byul IV
days.enigma: As Byul finished her Trial, she wanted to thank her guider who thanks to her she could reach where she is now. Byul gladly gave the flag to her guider as she was thanking her, she might not know how to break the 4th wall tho.
days.reaction: hopefully more adventures of both of you would come nchllh

days.title: Chronicles of Byul V
days.specialMess: For non ambiguity, Focus solely on chapter 1 for this riddle, this is the final Chronicles of Byul, Good luck !!!
days.enigma: How many Suns, How many Moons, How many cats, How many Gates, How many Statues, how many Travelers(?3), How many clocks. twin numbers decided to merge as sum. 4 and 3 befriended each other and decided to merge as sum. Sun and moon should stay aside
hints: it's a simple calcul, each slide is important to caclulate something

days.title: Abacus basics
days.specialMess: I think I have heard you learned Abacus I think? So I tried to learn some basics to show you this small enigma, if I found some interesting enigmas related to it, why not !!!

days.title: Guidance of Sunshine
days.specialMess: this Enigma might be one of the best ones I made, on behalf of my dream to make a treasure hunt realisable for my favourite person. Good Luck.
days.enigma: Sun has many different rays that emits on Earth. Once upon time, it emitted an UV ray, the exact location hasn't been spotted precisely, but we captured some povs footages that could lead you to its destination
hints: You might need some UV detector for this one
If I said Treasure hunt, I really meant it, hhh... Go hunt the place the secret message of the Sun !!
days.reaction: Indeed, She did guide me and she will surely do in the future nchllh

days.title: Jan Ken Shizazu !!!
days.specialMess: This month will be full of Video games or anything related to as game, some are gameplays or some are knowledge games based questions (NINTENDO, JHJDHCJHSVJ), I can't get excited to see you experience them !!!

days.title: How to unhover an autistic button
days.enigma: I hate this button, no matter what, it avoids me from clicking it, It's so frustrating, LSNLILOVEYOUQSNLQ. path is: /#/games/annoyingButton
hints: Is there a way to click on button without even clicking it
There should be a way, users without a mouse should have the ability to interact with web
days.reaction: I don't know what you did, but thanks for calming down that button !!!

days.title: pico memories I
days.specialMess: It's time enigma art again !!! with this theme goes to pico images where you try to guess which level was this pico game as flag answer: ${WorldName} Lvl.?

days.reaction: It was the start of new core memory cause she was there

days.title: pico memories II
days.specialMess: This level of today was also emotional one, about how we beated together that level, I wonder if we ever reach there with Nadine.

hints: A boss should only exist in the last level, not final world tho, weirdly...

days.title: pico memories V
days.specialMess: This level was also touching, considering that it was last level ever to beat for us, thank you for letting me experience this magical journey with you.
days.enigma: Go to this link to try find out which level was this in pico park 2, the flag format: ${WorldName} Lvl.?
hints: At last, pico soulmates stepped on their last level together, even tho it wasn't the last for the game...
days.reaction: Thank you so much to play with me, Chaima, I hope you know how precious this was for me

days.title: Unnoticed Enigma
days.enigma: Yes, I am autistic, I actually an Enigma to everyone's sight, but nobody noticed it I guess, I left a clue down this link
days.reaction: I am so embarassed... I will jump out of a cliff, hhh

days.title: The first Good Morning to The Moon
days.enigma: Do you wanna feel nostlagic ? There was a Time where we shared different yapping between, after that night, I think it was the first time you sent me Good Morning, DD/MM
hints: Are you today's date ? Cause you're DD/MM
days.reaction: It was really therapeutic and healing what you did to me, thank you again

days.title: Suspecious meeting
days.enigma: The Sun came early to a meet where weirdly she just found The moon there all lonely, it was a funny moment, so I wanted it to be a small enigma for today, hhh. As a challenge, try to get the code of that meet.
hints: The Sun came early to just copy the link for a friend, I wonder what module was that
it was only a day after first reunion of team cats in pico, that was so fun !!!
days.reaction: The moon secret scheme was wether if The Sun would come first, this would be an opportunity to yap with her, it worked, hehehe!!!
